org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.network

Class CallbackLooper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.network.CallbackLooper

  • public class CallbackLooper
extends java.lang.Object
    CallbackLooper provides a looper thread which is *not* the main app thread. This at times helps us receive and wait for callbacks without causing deadlock.
